name: Feeling Cloudy
description:
A sad and lonely pierrot wakes up in a place they haven't been to before. They have a cloud over their head, not giving them a second to dry off. Why am I here?

The cloud soon proves  itself useful as the pierrot realizes its ability to create more clouds for them to stand on.

CONTROLS:

A, D or Arrow keys to MOVE

W, Space or up-key to JUMP

E,S or down-key to SUMMON A CLOUD / INTERACT

F4 for FULLSCREEN

Game supports a controller

In case of low performance, please turn of lights and effects from the options menu.

CREDITS:

Art, story and programming: JyriO

Music: Chiphead64 - Cactusdude 

Menu sound effects: NenadSimic

Game version: 0.1
